From the brand

TCL 30 SE

Revolutionary Viewing

TCL 30XL

Elevate Your Vision

TCL 30 5G

Maximize Your Entertainment

TCL enjoy more

6.53” FHD+ Dotch LCD display: Powered by NXTVISION, will upgrade your visual experience with the sharper details, vibrant images and allow you to enjoy true-to-life color accuracy in everything you present.TCL 10L Unlocked Android Smartphone is made for the US with a one-year US warranty.
Superior clarity day & night: Coming with a 48MP high-res AI camera(48MP+8MP+2MP+2MP) and 6MP front-facing selfie camera, TCL 10L android phone helps you capture crisp and vivid pictures. The AI-powered camera recognizes and enhances scenes & objects for your best creations.
Compatible with GSM carriers(AT&T and T-Mobile). TCL 10L mobile phone is also certified for use on Verizon’s LTE network. If your device is not receiving messages or experiences an error when making phone calls on Verizon, your account may need to be provisioned to support “CDMA-less” devices, please contact Verizon’s technical support team or your account’s business representative for assistance. This phone is not compatible with CDMA networks. (such as Sprint, Spectrum, Xfinity, etc.)
Comfortable viewing all day: Auto-adjusting display provides the best viewing experience regardless of lighting conditions. A 4000mAh battery and Intelligent Battery Mode optimize power usage to keep you cord-free all day. Please know that on TCL 10L phone WIFI calling is only compatible with T-Mobile.

Superior Clarity

TCL 10L unlocked android smartphone capture the moment like never before with an AI quad camera system that integrates auto-brightness, super resolution, HDR & more. There are vibrant pixels in every shot, day or night. Experience 3 times more brightness and capture greater detail even in the darkest of settings.

Greater View

With the TCL 10L android phone you can find the beauty in little things with a Macro Camera that captures the rich textures, and tiny details of all your favorite things.

Full-Scene Photos

TCL 10L’s 118° wide-angle camera includes 3.3 times more of the world in a single shot. Gather your friends for a beautiful sunset and take an unforgettable photo or video – with everyone in it. Snap a breathtaking landscape and be able to capture the entirety of the beauty around you.

Imaginative Video

With the TCL 10L, you can set up shortcut keys in an instant. Get maximum control so you will know exactly what’s happening on your screen and what you’re touching, making life more convenient and effortless for you.

Read more

Smart Key for Fast Access

The Smart Key allows you to customize your TCL 10L mobile phone to access any dedicated app or feature with the press of a button. Make your phone as unique as you.

Effortless Unlocking

Never worry about your phone getting into the wrong hands again. With the convenience and security of two forms of authentication (Face Key and a fingerprint sensor), you get safe and fast access to your cell phone. One simple touch or glance will bring you straight to your favorite apps or important messages.

Powerful Audio

Enjoy a seamlessly connected lifestyle by connecting up to four speakers or headphones at once. Bring the party to life and share your favorite playlist on the go with a personalized listening experience.

Talkback Blind Mode

Optimized Power A 4000mAh battery and Intelligent Battery Mode optimize power usage to keep you cord-free all day.

Read more

Network

Compatible with GSM carriers, including AT&T and T-Mobile. TCL 10L unlocked smartphone is also certified for use on Verizon’s LTE network. If your device is not receiving messages or experiences an error when making phone calls on Verizon, your account may need to be provisioned to support “CDMA-less” devices, please contact Verizon’s team or your account’s business representative for assistance. This phone is not compatible with CDMA networks. (such as Sprint, Spectrum, Xfinity, etc.)

TCL 10L – NXTVISION Display

Optimize your media playback and creative expression with TCL 10L’s NXTVISION visual technology. Experience streaming in a whole new way thanks to an expansive 6.53” FHD+ NXTVISION display with a dedicated display engine that enhances color, clarity and contrast in real time. HDR feature improves ordinary videos so you can enjoy sharp, remastered HDR content no matter the source. Plus, browse and read comfortably with an array of eye protection modes.

Capture greatness with the NXTVISION 48MP AI-powered quad rear camera and 16MP front camera. The quad camera consists of a 48MP high resolution camera, a super wide-angle camera, a macro camera and a depth camera for amazing portraits. Create fun and artistic clips with wide angle and stop motion video modes.

Make life on the go a little easier with a powerful Qualcomm Snapdragon 665 octa-core processor, and a reliable 4000mAh battery with smart power optimization. Tap-and-go with a customizable interface, Smart Key, Face Key and fingerprint sensor that provide access effortlessly.

Technical Parameters:

HD Voice

1 x User Manual

From the brand

V+bestlife

We are constantly discovering and meeting the needs of this changing world, we believe in V (victory), we can pursue the best life!

We think instant messaging will be more and more important in our lives and it is! Similarly, we believe that there will be more and more different changes in the demand for instant messaging. In order to allow more people who do not have instant messaging to join the information life, in this field, we are committed to discovering some distinctive and more Easy circulation of cell phones and telephone!

Information spreads faster in this world; we are committed to better understanding needs and producing products that better meet them!

How did we get our start?

We found that some needs were not being met, and then we wanted to address the situation.

What makes our products unique?

Whether it is in different countries, different regions, or different concepts and consumption habits, the development of the world makes consumer demand change extremely fast and huge. We are constantly discovering this change, catching up with this change, meeting this change, and making our products more in line with consumer needs. This is our starting point, and this is why we think our products are different.

FH Group got you covered! Our premium cloth car seat covers not only provide the best protection for your car’s upholstery against any type of mess but they also enhance the looks of your car’s interior. No need to worry anymore about spills, stains, mud, or anything damaging your original car seats because this car seat protector got your back. Every car seat cover we make is built with high-quality, durable materials that will protect your car’s upholstery at all times. We offer automotive seat covers in numerous fabrics, colors, and designs, so you can easily find the seat cover for cars that fits your style the most. We have car seat covers for women, for men and for everyone. Our auto seat covers are compatible with most sedans, SUVs, and vans’ front seats thanks to the universal low back seat cover design that delivers the snug fit you’re looking for, only if the front seats’ headrest is removable. Also, because safety is one of our main goals, this front set of cover for car seats is airbag compatible (officially tested!). We understand messes happen, that’s why these waterproof seat covers for cars are convenient for any type of driver. FH Group car seat covers are a great car interior accessory for your vehicle. We have it all: car seat covers for SUV, car seat covers for autos, car seat covers for vans, you name it!
[UNIVERSAL FIT] Our semi-customized car seat cover fits most vehicles better than other universal covers in the market. Our design has hook-and-loop attachments for a snug fit, straps in the bottom seat, and more, for an almost-customized look
[HIGH-QUALITY AND DURABLE MATERIALS] Our premium cloth car seat covers full set is built with 3 layers of cloth, 3mm padding and mesh fabric, making our covers a reliable and durable car seat protector.
[WASHABLE CAR SEAT COVERS] These carseat covers are machine washable! Simply remove the car seat cover, machine wash, and air dry.
[AIRBAG COMPATIBLE] Our front seat car seat covers feature a special stitching on the side allowing airbag deployment. It’s officially tested, making our covers a reliable car seat protector.
[FRONT SEAT STORAGE POCKET] The front bucket seat covers feature a handy map pocket on the back of the seat so you can store everything you need and have easy access to it.
[CUSTOMIZABLE REAR COVER] This cover is compatible with any split bench and becomes 2 individual covers with the extra mesh piece. This cover features zippers providing full access to the middle armrest. Elongate cover by adding an extra piece.
[AVAILABLE IN DIFFERENT COLORS] FH Group’s car seats come in 10 different colors, so you can perfectly match your car’s style and aesthetic.

Premium Seat Covers, Auto Accessories and More!

At FH Group we offer a wide variety of automotive products designed to make your life easier and more enjoyable.

Read more

Travel Master Series Seat Covers

Package Includes:

2 Front low back bucket covers.

1 Rear backrest cover.

1 Rear bottom bench cover.

5 Separate headrest covers.

1 Bag of snaps.

Combo packs will include additional products.

Works with Split Bench

Designed to fit 50/50, 40/60, 60/40, or 40/20/40 split rear benches

Travel Master Seat Covers

Available in several different colors. Fabric disperses heat to keep you cool and comfortable.

Premium Polyester Fabric

An eye-catching pattern adorns the center panel of this cover, adding a graceful touch to our high quality fabric.

Read more

Compatibility and Installation

Compatibility and Buying Tips

Due to installation requirement, please ensure your headrests can be detached before buying this set.This set is compatible with front side airbags and rear split function.

Dimensions

Semi-Universal to fit a wide range of cars, trucks, and SUVs.

Installation

Installation is simple with our easy instruction videos available on our website. This product is only compatible with vehicles that have detachable or adjustable headrests.

Product Features:

  • Airbag compatible – special stitching on the side allows airbag deployment. Officially tested!
  • Designed to fit 50/50, 40/60, 60/40, or 40/20/40 split rear benches
  • Semi-customized to fit most vehicles. Will not interfere with heated seats.

Read more



Unique Flat Cloth Seat Covers Complete Set For Most Sedans, SUVs, and Trucks
Highback Style Neoprene Full Set Airbag Safe
Raised Edge Multi-Use Cargo Tray For Home and Auto
FH Group Textured Grip Steering Wheel Cover
Style: Flat Cloth Pattern. Neoprene Highback. Cargo Tray. Textured Grip Steering Wheel Cover.
Feature: Our high quality fabric with 3mm of breathable foam backing is soft to the touch and disperses heat, keeping you comfortable and cool on even the hottest summer days. These neoprene seat covers are waterproof, stain proof, and life proof to protect you from all kinds of disasters. Waterproof Neoprene with Non-Slip Backing. Rear seat cover designed to accommodate 50/50, 40/60, 60/40, and 40/20/40 split benches. Our premium all-weather cargo tray will deliver the ultimate protection for your trunk. Heavy duty rubber material protects your trunk against spills and messy cargo and a specially finished surface keeps your haul from shifting around. Is your steering wheel starting to fade and wear, direct sunlight and hot temperatures can damage car interiors. The FH Group Steering Wheel Cover is designed to protect your steering wheel, while adding a touch of class to your ride.
Package Included: 2 front low back bucket covers 1 rear backrest cover 1 rear bottom bench cover 4 separate headrest covers 1 bag of snaps. 2 bucket seat covers, 1 rear bench backrest cover, 1 rear bench bottom seat cover, 3 headrest covers. 1 Raised Edge Cargo Tray for Home and Auto. 1 Steering Wheel Cover.
Dimension: Semi-Universal. Semi-Universal. Available in 32″ and 40″ Sizes. Stretchable Silicone fits all vehicles from small sedans to Trucks and SUVs.
Cleaning Tips: Wipe Clean for best results use microfiber cloth. Wipe Clean for best results use microfiber cloth. Vaccuum or use soap and water. Air dry. Wipe Clean for best results use microfiber cloth.
Installation Tips: Helpful installation videos are available after purchase. Helpful installation videos are available after purchase. Simply place wherever needed! No installation Required. Easily slides over steering wheel.

FH Group International, Inc. is a manufacturer you can depend on and trust. Our mission is to exceed your expectations by providing a large selection of outstanding car accessories at affordable prices. We are constantly striving to provide our customers with the most efficient and friendly communications, smooth transactions, and speedy deliveries.

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

  • PRITOM L8 features a 2.0 MP front + 8.0 MP rear-facing camera for taking photos or shooting 1080p video. Sharing those special moments with your friends and family.

Read more

Access to Entertainment

  • PRITOM L8 Tablet with GMS Certified, easily get more entertainment on this tablet. Enjoy all your favorite movies and TV shows on YouTube and more.
  • Read comfotably with millions of eBook and magazine on line. Play more free popular games, social media and movie provider apps, and so much more.

Unique Design

  • Pritom L8 tablet built-in a high-quality BOX Speaker, sounds better and clearer.
  • There will be a PRITOM L8 tablet case(TC103, good-look) for this Pad NOW, if you wanna buy it, please search PRITOM L8 Tablet Case on amazon.

Slim-body & Lightweight

  • Pritom L8 is only weight of 0.73 lb, so you can put it into your bag with only occupying a small space.
  • Easy to carry and use in kitchen countertop, desktop, outside or a leisure place.

Read more

Long Battery Life

  • The Pritom L8 tablet is normally up to 4 hours video playback and up to 7 hours reading time. Fully charges in under 2-3 hours using the micro-USB power adapter.
  • It is a tablet for kids, Great, Valued gift of your choice.

Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

From the brand

Pritom is a leading independent brand selling Tablet PC, Laptops, Mp3 since 2012, focusing on product quality and customer shopping experience.Our products have received CE, RoHS, FCC and other related certificates- – Pritom Team aims to provide the Highest Quality Products and the Most Attentive Service for our customers. SO if you have any questions/issues, please reach us via Email, we will give a solution asap! That it is important for us!

Enjoy Time with PRITOM Tablets

Pritom 7 inch Kids Tablets

Pritom 7 inch Kids Tablets

★[HIGH PERFORMANCE ANDROID TABLET ] – Pritom Tronpad tablets comes with Android 10 Go OS, 2GB RAM, 32 GB ROM, the powerful and energy-saving Quad-core Processor enables quicker app launch, smoother videos, you can enjoy better overall performance experience. In addition, it includes a Micro SD card slot (can be added a expanded 256 GB TF Card Max, NOT included), making it easy to store Pictures videos, files etc. There is NO extra bloatware installed. Note: This tablet can’t add a SIM Card.
★[LONG-LASTING ENTERTAINMENT] – Pritom 10 inch tablet features android 10, GMS Certified, you can download thousands of apps, such as, Netflix, YouTube, Skype, and more popular apps. The large battery and low-power CPU enhance your experience and allow you to enjoy up to 8 hours of mixed reading, watching TV shows, surfing the web, playing light games and more. It is a really good companion for your leisure and entertainment. Large IPS Touchscreen will be a plus.
★[Low bloatware & Dual Cameras] – With Front 2.0 MP & Rear 8.0 MP camera, which would bring your photos and videos to life. Pritom Tronpad 10” tablet rivals most of the 10 inch tablet and it is convenient for taking photos, capturing and sharing those special moments with your friends and family. Pritom Tronpad tablet meets your basic daily needs, such as watching videos, Live and reading. A good tablet for your choise, very Low bloatware, No ads!
★[BRILLIANT IPS DISPLAY ] – Pritom 10 inch tablet PC adopts a 1280 x 800 brilliant HD IPS display. This android tablet has a sharper hierarchy of images and richer colors, and provides shocking performance of visual experience. With the Eye Health mode, an extra feature filters out blue light to relieve visual fatigue, and optimizes the backlight for a more comfortable reading experience.
★[1-year WARRANTY & SUPPORT] – Pritom Tablet PC comes with 1-year worry-free guarantee – If it is the tablet quality issue, return it and we’ll replace it for free. Pritom team focuses on the customer’s pleasant shopping experience and provides reliable customer service. Please do not hesitate to contact us if you have any problem, we will give you on-time TECH SUPPORT and the better customer service. Looking foward to hearing from you(CS email).

PRITOM Tronpad Tablets, Meet All Your Basic Needs

  • PRITOM Tonpad tablet fits for everyone. This tablet has a large 10.1 inch high-definition touchscreen, 1280 * 800 IPS Display, 2.0 MP front and 8.0 MP rear camera. The ultra-high tablet configuration meets all your daily needs!
  • PRITOM tends to create the best products and the best user experience. Lightweight and portable tablets or ideal gifts? PRITOM Tablet, it’s worth having!

Designed for Entertainment

  • The 10 inch tablet came with the high-performance overall configuration, No Ads, No extra bloatware installed.
  • Delivers the perfect mix of power, portability and performance – flawlessly running games and apps, as well as quicker loads of web pages, Free thousands of apps. Just logging into Google Play Store and download free apps, like Tik Tok YouTube/Kids etc.

Greater Battery Capacity

  • The tablet equipped with a large lithium battery, that allows you to enjoy up to 8 hours of mixed reading, watching TV shows, surfing the web, playing light games and more
  • You can use your 10” tablet to spend time while traveling or moving. It is really a good companion for your leisure and entertainment. Support GPS.

Quality Audiovisual Experience

  • The android tablet PC adopts a 1280 x 800 brilliant HD IPS display, Enjoy wide screen movies and games with wide viewing angles, less glare, and more brightness while you watch.
  • And with two loudspeakers, can enjoy clear sound quality when you watch videos or play games

Read more

Large Storage Space

  • This Android tablet comes bundled with 32GB ROM, and up to 128GB of external memory with micro SD card support（Not included in this tablet).
  • No more worrying about tablet memory. Huge room(128 GB Expandable) for everything, from your go-to shows to your favorite games.

HD Camera

  • The PRITOM M10 Android tablets features a 8.0MP rear-facing camera .it is convenient for taking photos, capturing and sharing those special moments wherever you like.
  • The 2.0 MP front-facing camera is perfect for Selfie and Skype calls with friends and family.Give you a perfect time.

Tablet Cover Case

  • PLEASE NOTE: Tablet Cover Case Is Sold Separately. You can search PRITOM Tronpad 10 inch tablet case for this tablet PC.
  • Good basic tablet, Very low bloatware, No ads!

Product Description

High Quality: High quality material, soft and tough, durable.Waterproof and Heat Resistant: Can be used in any bad weather like rainy, sunny or snowy. Effectively block rainwater, reduce glare, and make driving vision clearer.Easy Installation: With double-sided tape, just peel off and stick on the rearview mirror that needs to be installed. After installation, it will not affect the folding of the rearview mirror, and will not leave traces and glue when torn off, and will not cause damage to the body.Perfect Decoration: Not only is it powerful, it can also decorate your car and look more stylish.

Contrast before and after the use of the rearview mirror rain cover:

1. The vision will be better in rainy days, don’t worry about the blurred vision caused by the raindrops on the rearview mirror.

2. The rear-view mirror rain cover can reduce the glare of the rear-view mirror under the sun, making your driving safer.

3. It can also be used as a car decoration at ordinary times to make your car more sporty.

Step 1

Clean the mirrors.

Step 2

Tear off the adhesive.

Step 3

Install to target location.

Step 4

The installation is complete.

【Material】: Our car rear view mirror rain eyebrow is made of soft PVC plastic that is 100% soft and flexible. It will not break or deform easily and can meet your needs for a long time.
【Size】: The size of this rear view guard eyebrow is about 7.28*2.17in, appropriate size will prevent rain from falling on the rearview mirror without blocking your view, full protection for your rearview mirror.
【Wide Application】: The side mirror rain guard can be widely applied in most kinds of cars and vehicles, like trucks, buses, tractors, SUVs, motorcycles and so on.
【Easy to Install】: The mixed adhesive is very sticky but does not leave marks, please pay attention to clean the rearview mirror before sticking and installing it when it is dry and dust free.
【Safe Driving】: Rain and heavy snow can blur the rearview mirror and thus interfere with your driving vision. Installing rain eyebrows can effectively block the interference of rain and snow, provide a clear vision and improve the safety of driving on rainy days.

  1. High Quality: High quality material, soft and tough, durable.
  2. Waterproof and Heat Resistant: Can be used in any bad weather like rainy, sunny or snowy. Effectively block rainwater, reduce glare, and make driving vision clearer.
  3. Easy Installation: With double-sided tape, just peel off and stick on the rearview mirror that needs to be installed. After installation, it will not affect the folding of the rearview mirror, and will not leave traces and glue when torn off, and will not cause damage to the body.
  4. Perfect Decoration: Not only is it powerful, it can also decorate your car and look more stylish.

►【Multi-function Backing Camera】Back up camera systems for car is IP69 waterproof, Switch Rear or front view etc function. Also upgraded camera that the bracket can be hidden under the license plate.
► 【Monitor Button Function】The reverse camera can turn on/off guide lines through the buttons of the monitor, move the guide lines to right, left, up and down and adjust the line width. Also 4.3 inch monitor can switch Brightness/Contrast/Saturation/Tint/Language and reset.

Why choose Vanexiss Car Sun Visor Mirror？

— Ordinary mirror: Insufficient brightness, heavy makeup

— Vanexiss fill light mirror: Bright and clear

Do you encounter such troubles in the car?

Forgot to bring your vanity mirror

– The car is too dark

– Not enough light Car rearview mirror

– Too high and too far

For this I recommend it for you – Vanexiss Car Makeup Mirror with Light

Dimmable Color LED Lights

Including 3 color lighting modes and stepless dimming function, which can be dimmed or intensified for your needs. Long press for dimming according to what you need.

USB RECHARGEABLE

Built-in 1800 mAh lithium battery, which can be charged by car, socket, computer, mobile power, free to use the vanity mirror at anywhere and anytime.

UNIVERSAL SIZE DESIGN

The size of makeup mirror is 10.2(L)*5.3(W)*0.4(H) inch, which suits for most of the sun visor of cars.

SMART DOUBLE TOUCH CONTROL DESIGN

There are two touch sensors, simply touch one of touch switches to turn on and off. You can switch the two colors of the lights(cool white, warm yellow). Long press to adjust the brightness of the lights.

The best gift for your families and lovers.

DIMMABLE COLOR LED LIGHTS – Your mirror goes in the sun visor, so the light is even on your face. You can doing your makeup with this mirror with flawless results because of the impeccable lighting. Including 3 color lighting modes and stepless dimming function, which can be dimmed or intensified for your needs. Long press for dimming according to what you need.
USB RECHARGEABLE – Built-in 1800 mAh lithium battery, which can be charged by car, socket, computer, mobile power, free to use the vanity mirror at anywhere and anytime. It can last 8 hours if 100% brightness while always On mode.
SMART DOUBLE TOUCH CONTROL DESIGN – There are two touch sensors, simply touch one of touch switches to turn on and off. You can switch the two colors of the lights(cool white, warm yellow). Long press to adjust the brightness of the lights. Memory function makes this mirror with lights return to the same brightness and color when you last using.
UNIVERSAL SIZE DESIGN – The size of makeup mirror is 8(L)*5(W)*0.35(H) inches, which suits for most of the sun visor of cars. Compact and lightweight design, easy to install and use, does not take up extra space inside the cars.
Customers satisfaction is our top priority! If you are not satisfied with the visor makeup mirror or any issues, please contact us freely, we provide lifetime warranty.
